techmeme.title: Shenzhen-based humanoid robot maker Leju Robotics raised $200M+ led by Citic Goldstone and Shenzhen Investment Holdings ahead of a planned IPO (Bloomberg)
Crypto trading firm FalconX agrees to acquire 21shares, one of the main crypto ETF managers, for an undisclosed sum; 21shares had $11B+ in assets in September (Vicky Ge Huang/Wall Street Journal)
Sources: Apple cuts iPhone Air orders nearly to "end of production" levels after a lukewarm reception in China, but keeps iPhone 17 lineup forecasts at 85M-90M (Nikkei Asia)
UEFA joins the MPA-led anti-piracy coalition Alliance for Creativity and Entertainment, the first sports governing body to join the group, which has 50+ members (Adam Leventhal/The Athletic)
Sources: Microsoft is significantly increasing the price of its Xbox Development Kit from $1,500 to $2,000, after hiking Series X prices by $150 in September (Tom Warren/The Verge)
